content_en: You Don't Have to care it.

title_en: Initiating the development of Trigger Card.
content_ko:
오늘 2025년 12월 20일로 Trigger Card의 개발이 시작되었어요!
 2026년 1분기~2분기 내로 만나요!
 -민양테크
content_en:
We are pleased to announce that development of Trigger Card has commenced today, Dec 20, 2025.
Expected release: Q1~Q2 2026.
 -MinYang Tech
